```{r bost}
#rm(list = ls())

#install.packages("MASS")
library(MASS)
attach(Boston)
?Boston
head(Boston)
dim(Boston)
names(Boston)
str(Boston)

ncol(Boston)
summary(Boston)
```

```{r auto}
#install.packages("ISLR")
library(ISLR)
data(Auto)
head(Auto)
head(Auto,10)
names(Auto)
summary(Auto)
fivenum(Auto$mpg)
boxplot(Auto$weight)

```
